statements.select: SELECT Id, ParentId, Name, Value, Remark FROM SystemSetting WHERE Name=#value#
SELECT a.Id, a.ParentId, a.Name, a.Value, a.Remark FROM SystemSetting a WHERE Name=#value# OR ParentId IN ( SELECT Id FROM SystemSetting WHERE Name=#value# )
statements.insert: IF EXISTS(SELECT * FROM SystemSetting WHERE (Name=#Name# AND ParentId IS NULL) OR (Name=#Name# AND ParentId=#ParentId#)) UPDATE SystemSetting SET [Value]=#Value# WHERE Name=#Name# ELSE INSERT INTO SystemSetting ( Id, ParentId, Name, [Value] ) VALUES ( NEWID(), #ParentId#, #Name#, #Value# )
